title: Maria Callas (1962) At Covent Garden.avi
description:
Plot Synopsis	by Perry Seibert

This video captures a pair of performances from the revered opera diva Maria Callas. Her authoritative voice delivers work by beloved composers Verdi, Puccini, and Bizet, at Covent Gardens, one of the most famous opera venues in the world. The concerts date from 1962.
